```{r, results='asis', echo=FALSE, warning = FALSE}
library(htmltools)

HTML("<h2 style='margin-top:20px;'>Intro Theme — Welcome to Gotta Graph ’Em All</h2>")

HTML("<p style='font-size:16px; margin-bottom:10px; max-width:820px;'>
This quick throwback sets the tone for our project, bringing a bit of nostalgia, energy, and a reminder of why we fell in love with Pokémon in the first place. Before diving into the stats and modeling, enjoy the theme that inspired an entire generation of trainers.
</p>")

tag1 <- tags$iframe(
  src = "https://www.youtube.com/embed/6xKWiCMKKJg",
  width = "960", height = "540",
  style = "max-width:100%;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-radius:8px;margin-bottom:30px;",
  allow = "accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share",
  allowfullscreen = 1
)
HTML(as.character(tag1))
```
